thread.title: Who Needs French Fries When You Can Make These Grilled Sweet Potatoes With Brie and Honey?
thread.title_full: Who Needs French Fries When You Can Make These Grilled Sweet Potatoes With Brie and Honey?

author: Munchies Staff
title: Who Needs French Fries When You Can Make These Grilled Sweet Potatoes With Brie and Honey?
text:
Who Needs French Fries When You Can Make These Grilled Sweet Potatoes With Brie and Honey? February 24, 2017 / 8:00 pm By Munchies Staff 
Nachos are great. French fries are great. Sadly, we live in a world in which eating copious amounts of the two foods is not only advised against, it’s looked down upon. 
Luckily for you, Texas-based chef Tim Love has provided MUNCHIES with a recipe that not only combines all the best elements of nachos and French fries, but isn’t so bad for you that you’ll spend half a week lounging in a Snuggie. RECIPE: Grilled Sweet Potatoes with Brie and Honey 
Love’s grilled sweet potatoes with brie and honey is not only a kickass alternative to nachos and French fries, it’s also just about the easiest dish in the world to make. In addition to tossing the sweet potatoes in a mixture of triple cream brie and honey, the tubers are dressed with a heavy pinch of chili flakes and some chives for garnish. 
Who in the hell needs to longingly stare at some soggy, day-old French fries your friend drunkenly left out when you can just make yourself something far, far better?
